title: The language filter wont turn off?
body: Chat censoring randomly turned back on and even if i click enable or disable it stays on. Only in game though, when i message somebody in champ select or in a message its not censored. I only use the old client, ive tried the thing where you go in notepad and manually disable it and it still wont work. Please someone help i miss being able to say what i want

replies.body: /chatfilter in game toggles it. Mine is off when it says it's on, but whatever.

There are currently a few different workarounds that have been resolving issues with the chat filter. The biggest one is swapping over to the other client. Since you're using the Legacy Client currently, I recommend upgrading to the Beta Client to see if it resolves the issue. Don't worry, you'll still be able to access the Legacy Client after upgrading.

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

If you run into further issues after testing that workaround, let me know.

I already was upgraded, i just really dont like the new client at all. But even when i swap to the new client censoring is still on. Does this have anything to do with me being chat restricted? It started later in my reform period.

No, chat restrictions won't impact this, this is a fairly rare bug. I forgot to mention in my last reply that you'll want to hop into the Beta Client's settings (cog icon in the top, right corner) and disable the chat filter, as shown in the screenshot below:

https://imgur.com/a/odOW9

If this didn't work, let me know.

When i went in to the settings of the new client it was already disabled. I enabled it then got in a custom and chat was censored but when i left, disabled it and got in a custom it wasnt censored. Thanks a ton. Ill let you know if it bugs out again. Have a nice day
Nah, happens on my account too, and I've never received punishment.
